strapiPost.title: First Thursday Returns
strapiPost.content:
As if we don't have enough reason to be excited for summer, Experience Fayetteville has announced the return of "First Thursday" in Downtown Fayetteville on August 5th.

  • Business as usual: First Thursday is always FREE and open to the public - while the season is shorter this year, the event will still celebrate Fayetteville's local arts culture, music, food, and beer.
  • What to look forward to: August 5 - Dog Daze of Summer / September 2 - Tight Knit / October 7 - Light

Want to get involved or learn more? The vendor, sponsorship packet, and more can all be found HERE.
